title: looking for a team to go pro with (like one day play in the LCS)
body: hi guys. my names thomas but my frinds call me tom. haha. I'm only 13 but I'm looking for a serious team to go pro with. im bronze 3 at the moment but don't worry im a quick learner. my friends sometimes call me baby faker. pretty sure ill be plat by next week.. anyways, plz reply if u wanna go pro. im thinking once we make LCS we get a manssion gaming house or something too. and the fridge is always filled with red bull. but not the blue flavour their gross. haha. also you can only join my team if your diamond 1 or higher. also you must play everyday bettween the hours of 4pm and 9pm cause I finish school at 3 and gotta be in bed by 9. oh and one more thing, since ill be the captain of the team im going to choose what our team name will be (im thinking something like shadow warriors or night hawks) and ill choose mid lane as my role so don't bother if your a mid lane player xD...

replies.body:
"Play everyday bettween the hours of 4pm and 9pm"

No-one can say you're not committed. Jesus Christ...
is this guy kidding himself? roflmfao???
Quite likely more than just himself :P
pls dont comment if urnot seerious..
Ill chuck this guy a bone and join his team! lol! doesn't look like any takers yet?
sorry man teams full now haha, I've got 2 positions left on the bench if you want that????
